trans-unit.source: Base class for controls that can switch states, such as <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別的控制項，可以切換的狀態，例如<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A ToggleButton is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: ToggleButton 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，這表示它可以包含單一物件的任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或工作面板）。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A> property specifies the state of the ToggleButton.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A>屬性會指定狀態的 ToggleButton。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsThreeState%2A> property specifies whether the ToggleButton has two or three states.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsThreeState%2A>屬性會指定 ToggleButton 是否有兩個或三個狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ToggleButton Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ToggleButton controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 自訂 ToggleButton 控制項至適用於多個 ToggleButton 控制項使用相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ToggleButton, see [ToggleButton Syles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和專屬於 ToggleButton 的狀態，請參閱[ToggleButton Syles 和範本](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在按鈕控制項的預設範本，並使用的設定。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton"></xref>已核取。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 發生時的狀態<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton"></xref>既不是 on 或 off。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.Indeterminate"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton"></xref> is checked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton"></xref>已核取。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton"></xref> is checked; false if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton"></xref> is unchecked; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton"></xref>會檢查; false <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton"> </xref>未核取; 否則為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the control supports two or three states.
trans-unit.target: 決定控制項是否支援兩個或三個狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A> property can be set to `null` as a third state when IsThreeState is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A>屬性可以設定為`null`為第三個狀態時 IsThreeState `true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control supports three states; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此控制項支援三種狀態。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Called when a control is clicked by the mouse or the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 當按一下控制項的滑鼠或鍵盤時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供適當<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ToggleButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>實作此控制項，做為一部分[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]基礎結構。

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 特定型別的<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>實作。

trans-unit.source: Called by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.OnClick*> method to implement toggle behavior.
trans-unit.target: 由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.OnClick*>來實作切換行為的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.OnClick*>

trans-unit.source: This method toggles the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法切換<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的字串表示法<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns a string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ToString 方法會傳回字串，包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>和值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示法<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton"></xref>為未選取狀態。
